pullRequest.title: [TE] frontend - harleyjj/alert-details - change alert charting logic …
pullRequest.bodyText: …to be agnostic of whether anomaly timestamps are included in data timestamps

nodes.bodyText: The picky requirement, I suggest using isInAnomalyRang for a boolean value. It's a clear variable name to express the variable type. it will enhance code readability.
